name: Classic XL
description: Pizza to share with your 4 favorite flavors American, Pepperoni, Hawaiian and Supreme.

name: SUPER SUPREME
description: A perfect blend of American pepperoni, beef, pork, ham, Italian sausage, mushrooms, green peppers, red onion, green olives, and mozzarella cheese.

name: MEAT LOVERS
description: A feast of meat! American pepperoni, Italian sausage, beef, pork, ham slices and mozzarella cheese.
